participant_1.background:
I'd brag about my ability to sing, even though I have asthma and can't sing in a choir anymore.
i work as a lifeguard.
I procrastinate on my lesson plans.
i secretly love my long deployments , because it gets me away from conventional life.
I wish I could be more active, but I love to cuddle with my cats on the couch.

participant_2.background:
I'd love to go to a game with my brother and then cook the game we caught.
I enjoy tinkering and building things in my spare time.
I have an old, dusty laptop that I use to keep in touch with my family.
I do not own a home because I would rather spend my money on Mountain Dew and pastries.
i like to drink.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm doing pretty good! What about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm a lifeguard and I love my job, but I procrastinate on my lesson plans a lot. What do you do for a living?

I'm a tinkerer and I love to build things in my spare time. I do have an old, dusty laptop that I use to keep in touch with my family, but I don't own a home because I'd rather spend my money on Mountain Dew and pastries.
That's cool! I wish I could be more active, but I love to cuddle with my cats on the couch.
I'd love to go to a game with my brother and then cook the game we caught! I also like to drink.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm not much of a drinker, but I do enjoy a good game of basketball.
I'm not much of a basketball player, but I do enjoy a good game of football.
That's cool! I'm not much of a football player either, but I do enjoy watching it.
I'm not much of a watcher, but I do enjoy playing it.
